reviewText: One of the best films on alcoholism you could see. Highly recommended for anyone of any adult age to learn or confirm what you may already know about this destructive addiction.
The DVD was shipped fast and the price was more than fair. The DVD was a gift and the person was very happy to have the movie on DVD.

The quality of this DVD was absolutely terrable. It is unwatchable and reminds me of a home made DVD. I was ripped off.

Regards

Paul Norris
